thread.title: 21 Times "Jersey Shore" Was A Fucking Shitshow
thread.title_full: 21 Times "Jersey Shore" Was A Fucking Shitshow

author: Michelle Regna
title: 21 Times "Jersey Shore" Was A Fucking Shitshow
text:
View this image ›
MTV ID: 10506160 View this image ›
MTV ID: 10521470 3. And speaking of arrests, never forget when that high school gym teacher punched poor Snooks in the face. MTV — mamameows
ID: 10406000 4. When someone (Vinny) actually flushed their undershirt, clogging the toilet for a good two weeks. View this image ›
MTV — sunbaee
ID: 10406011 5. When Mike “The Situation” enjoyed an egg sandwich while watching Pauly D’s “slam session.” View this image ›
MTV —Me
ID: 10551430 6. Two words: THE NOTE. MTV — lindseyt4c2951a3a
ID: 10406380 7. And in case Round 1 of Sammi Sweetheart vs. JWoww wasn’t enough, Round 2 was just as insane. MTV — alexisdecarvalho
ID: 10406305 8. JWoww also clocked Mike in Atlantic City. View this image ›
MTV — ls2310
ID: 10406998 9. And perhaps the most iconic Jersey Shore fight was in Italy, when The Situation took on a concrete wall. MTV — Alexis
ID: 10406963 10. When Deena brought home a girl, decided mid-makeout she wasn’t into chicks, and passed the girl off to Vinny. MTV —Maytté Hernández Morales, Facebook
ID: 10428034 11. When Ron broke everything in Sammi’s room — including her seeing glasses !!! MTV — bernadettet3
ID: 10406800 12. When Snooki crashed into a cop car in Italy. View this image ›
MTV — meganm4ecb6421d
ID: 10413927 13. All the pranks! Like when Deena and Snooki thought they were going to Jenks but instead Mike ordered them a cab to Times Square. View this image ›
MTV — kaciecuevas2
ID: 10406272 14. When Ron, Sam, and Snooki sprinkled, spread, and schmeared cheese all over The Situation’s bed. MTV — Cortney Sebesta, Facebook
ID: 10428038 15. And when Mike let JWoww’s dogs go on a pissing and shitting spree around the house. View this image ›
MTV — kelseyr4f7d3c2d9
ID: 10413923 16. When Snooki’s ass was super itchy after a spray tan so she backed it up into a mini fridge. MTV — bellabeauty
ID: 10403847 17. When Mike’s ex got him good by sending him a cake — which he and Pauly devoured — that some dude’s balls had touched. MTV — anabanana1234
ID: 10406314 18. And perhaps in the messiest series of events, when Team Meatball got so trashed Deena danced her bottoms off… View this image ›
MTV ID: 10538847 19. …Snooki flew into a bush… View this image ›
MTV ID: 10538849 20. …Deena flashed her bush… MTV
MTV
 “All I know is, Deena needs a wax.” —JWoww
ID: 10539027 21. …and then they finished the night off with a makeout sesh. View this image ›
MTV — zombie93
